Articles.Content: So I am in love with KSP. Saying that I have found a few mods I love but some of them don't work right. I've installed the right, the parts show up, but the action buttons that are supposed to come up when you right click just don't show up. I'm using the latest version of KSP on Steam, but I have tried to use older versions  3.1, 3.3, 4.2, 4.3, and still nothing! I'm using the construction mod from Magic smoke industries, the FTL mod, and the near future construction mods. I've looked in the forums and tried to install them again and again. This is my last stop for any help. Thanks for any heip.

Welcome to the forums! Hope you stick around!

Is it just the mod parts that are unclickable, or is it all parts?

Make sure you have all of the mods’ dependencies installed. It should say in the first post of the mod’s thread. Also make sure you’re using the right KSP version (check in the title of the thread. If it says something like [1.3.1] and you’re using version 1.4.5, the mod will most likely not work.).

I hope that helped

Did you install module manager?

Click through blocker, other dependencies?
I have a module manager in the game data folder, and I've looked at the Mod threads they were useless

On 10/5/2018 at 10:55 AM, olvertwist said:

I've looked at the Mod threads they were useless

There's your problem.  You thought the mod threads are useless.     The threads are the primary source of info and support about a mod.    The mods have been installed by tens of thousands of other people with no issues, using those threads.  So there is something you have forgotten to do, or are doing wrong.   And that's why we're going to help!

It's most likely that you haven't installed one of the dependencies that are listed in each mod thread.  Usually mod makers will bundle the dependencies as needed, but sometimes they don't.  So go to the first post in each mod thread, and confirm you have each individual dependency installed correctly. 

 

Edited October 6, 2018 by Gargamel

I may have not read all of the threads so when I get time and can tear my self away from the game I will go back over them. Thank you for your help and I will let you know what I cum up with. I know its something i'm missing.
